Ootab ta minupoolset huvi asja vastu?
context: "minust" is the Estonian word that means "from me/my perspective/my side." It's derived from "mina" (I/me) and indicates something originating from, belonging to, or being on the same side as the speaker. In the dictionary definition, it shows usage in phrases like "minupoolne" which means "on my side" or "mine-related." The word is used when referring to one's own position, viewpoint, or things that belong to one's side of an argument or discussion.
